column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday April 11 at 4:00 p.m.

column5: One lane open in each direction.  Injury collision.

column3: UK Blue-White Game / Nicholasville Rd Traffic Pattern:
column4: On Friday afternoon April 12 between 4 p.m. and 6 p.m., Nicholasville Rd will have two lanes open in each direction.

column3: UK Blue-White Game / Nicholasville Rd Traffic Pattern:
column4: The regular rush hour traffic pattern will not be in effect.  Motorists traveling outbound can expect long delays.
